Sentencas: We theoretically investigate the electricity storage/generation in a reversible solid oxide cell stack.
Titulo: Electricity Storage With High Roundtrip Efficiency in a Reversible Solid Oxide Cell Stack

Sentencas: The system heat is for the first time tentatively stored in a phase-change metal when the stack is operated to generate electricity in a fuel cell mode and then reused to store electricity in an electrolysis mode.
Titulo: Electricity Storage With High Roundtrip Efficiency in a Reversible Solid Oxide Cell Stack

Sentencas: The state of charge (H-2 frication in cathode) effectively enhances the open circuit voltages (OCVs) while the system gas pressure in electrodes also increases the OCVs.
Titulo: Electricity Storage With High Roundtrip Efficiency in a Reversible Solid Oxide Cell Stack

Sentencas: On the other hand, a higher system pressure facilitates the species diffusion in electrodes that therefore accordingly improve electrode polarizations.
Titulo: Electricity Storage With High Roundtrip Efficiency in a Reversible Solid Oxide Cell Stack

Sentencas: With the aid of recycled system heat, the roundtrip efficiency reaches as high as 92% for the repeated electricity storage and generation.
Titulo: Electricity Storage With High Roundtrip Efficiency in a Reversible Solid Oxide Cell Stack
